phrase: I save the file every day.
He runs a command in the terminal.
transcription: /hi rʌnz ə kəˈmænd ɪn ðə ˈtɜːrmɪnəl/

phrase: We create new data for the test.
transcription: /wi krɪˈeɪt nuː deɪtə fɔːr ðə test/

phrase: There is an error in the file.
transcription: /ˈðɛər ɪz ən ˈɛrər ɪn ðə faɪl/
